newsitem.title: USA: Shelter Components sees lower Q4 oper shr.
newsitem.headline: Shelter Components sees lower Q4 oper shr.

text.p: Shelter Components Corp said Tuesday it expects to report a fourth quarter operating profit of below $0.10 a share, down from the $0.27 earned in the fourth quarter of 1995.
The fourth quarter 1996 operating profit excludes a gain on the sale of its carpet operations, which Shelter estimates at about $0.40 a share.

Shelter said the primary cause for the decline in fourth quarter operating results relates to year-end physical inventory adjustments at the carpet manufacturing operations, which were sold on December 31, 1996.
